title: Wanted to buy or trade T204's
author: sb1

posts.post_title: Wanted to buy or trade T204's
posts.post_content:
I have quite a few nicer grade T204's that I would trade for ones I need, SGC 50-80 and PSA 4-7. Commons and HOFers. I will also buy higher grade ones outright or trade some of my stockpile of goodies if needed, 1 card or a big group is ok.

Please let me know what you might have.

Scott
